scripts.copy: cp build/content.js dist/src/ && cp build/contextMenus.js dist/src/ && cp build/options.js dist/src/ && cp build/util.js dist/src/
scripts.parcel: parcel build build/background.js -d dist/src/ -o background && parcel build build/nn.js -d dist/src/ -o nn
scripts.build: tsc && npm run parcel && npm run copy
scripts.ff-build: npm run build && web-ext run -s dist
